crisp.description: The air feels [b]crisp[/b], [i]sharp[/i] and clean like it was just conjured into existence.

stale.description: The air feels [b]stale[/b], as if it hasn't moved in centuries.

choking.description: The air feels [b]choking[/b], thick and [i]heavy[/i] like it's trying to crawl into your lungs.

humid.description: The air feels [b]humid[/b], dense with moisture and tension.

charged.description: The air feels [b]charged[/b], tingling against your skin as if [i]magic[/i] is waiting to spark.

heavy.description: The air feels [b]heavy[/b], pressing down on you with unseen weight.

dry.description: The air feels [b]dry[/b], cracking your lips and throat with every breath.

electric.description: The air feels [b]electric[/b], as though a storm is silently coiled within the walls, buzzing with [color=cyan]energy[/color].

fragrant.description: The air feels [b]fragrant[/b], unexpectedly pleasant and eerily inviting.

dusty.description: The air feels [b]dusty[/b], carrying the weight of forgotten things stirred into motion.
